headline: Police 'locate' suspects behind Paris attack
news: Still unclear if police have apprehended suspects said to be in the Aisne region in northern France, AFP reports.

headline: Polls close in Sri Lanka presidential vote
news: Election Commissioner says voting was "free and fair" in tight race between President Rajapaksa and ex-ally Sirasena.

headline: China to invest $20bn in struggling Venezuela
news: Beijing agrees to more than $20bn in economic, social, and oil-related projects, as Caracas remains mired in recession.

headline: Syrian fighters destroy historic Muslim tomb
news: Al-Qaeda-linked Nusra Front blows up 800-year-old mausoleum of leading Islamic scholar, Imam Nawawi, in Deraa province.
